name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Ta-Seen-Meem. (Alphabets of the Arabic language – Allah, and to whomever he reveals, know their precise meanings.)

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: These are verses of the clear Book.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Possibly you may risk your life (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) by grieving, because they did not believe.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: If We will, We can send down on them a sign from the sky so that their leaders would remain bowed before it.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And never does a new advice come to them from the Most Gracious, but they turn away from it.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Indeed they have denied, so now soon coming upon them are the tidings of what they used to scoff at.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Have they not seen the earth, that how many honourable pairs We have created in it?

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Indeed in this is a sign; and most of them will not accept faith.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And indeed your Lord – indeed only He is the Almighty, the Most Merciful.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And (remember) when your Lord said to Moosa, “Go to the unjust people.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “The nation of Firaun; will they not fear?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: He said, “My Lord, I fear that they will deny me.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “I feel hesitant, and my tongue does not speak fast, therefore make Haroon also a Noble Messenger.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And they have an accusation against me, so I fear that they may kill me.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: He said, “Not like this (any more); both of you go with Our signs, We are with you, All Hearing.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Therefore approach Firaun then proclaim, ‘We both are Noble Messengers of the Lord Of The Creation.’

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: ‘That you let the Descendants of Israel go with us.’”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Said Firaun, “Did we do not raise you amongst us, as a child? And you spent many years of your life among us!”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And you committed the deed of yours that you committed, and you were ungrateful.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Said Moosa, “I did that at a time when I was unaware of the consequences.” (In anger – See verse 28:15)

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “I therefore went away from you as I feared you – so my Lord commanded me and appointed me as one of the Noble Messengers.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And is this some great reward for which you express favour upon me – that you have enslaved the Descendants of Israel?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Said Firaun, “And what is the Lord Of The Creation?

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Said Moosa, “Lord of the heavens and the earth and all that is between them; if you believe.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Said Firaun to those around him, “Are you not listening with attention?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Said Moosa, “Your Lord and the Lord of your forefathers preceding you.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Said Firaun, “This (Noble) Messenger of yours, who has been sent towards you, has no intelligence!”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: He said, “The Lord of the East and the West and all that is between them; if you have sense.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Said Firaun, “If you ascribe any one else as a God other than me, I will surely imprison you.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Said Moosa, “Even if I bring to you something clear?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Said Firaun, “Then bring it, if you are of the truthful.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So Moosa put down his staff and it became a visible serpent.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And he drew forth his hand, thereupon it shone bright before the beholders.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Said Firaun to the court members around him, “He is indeed an expert magician.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “He wishes to expel you out of your land by his magic; so what is your advice?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: They said, “Stop him and his brother, and send gatherers to the cities.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “To bring to you every expert great magician.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So the magicians were gathered at a set time on a day appointed.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And it was said to the people, “Have you (also) gathered?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: The people said, “Perhaps we may follow the magicians if they are victorious.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So when the magicians came, they said to Firaun, “Will we get some reward if we are victorious?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: He said, “Yes, and you will then become close to me.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Moosa said to them, “Cast whatever you intend to cast.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So they threw down their ropes and their staves and exclaimed, “By the honour of Firaun, indeed victory is ours!”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Therefore Moosa put forth his staff – so it immediately began swallowing all their fabrications.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: The magicians therefore fell down prostrate.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: They said, “We have accepted faith in the Lord Of The Creation.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “The Lord of Moosa and Haroon.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Said Firaun, “You accepted faith in him before I permitted you! He is indeed your leader who taught you magic; so now you will come to know; I swear, I will certainly cut off your hands and your feet from alternate sides, and crucify all of you.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: They said, “No harm (in it), we will return to our Lord.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “We hope that our Lord will forgive us our mistakes, as we are the first to believe.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And We sent the divine revelation to Moosa that, “Journey along with My bondmen within the night, for you will be pursued.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So Firaun sent gatherers into the cities.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: They announced “These people are a small group.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And indeed they have angered all of us.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And indeed we are an alert army.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: We therefore got them out from the gardens and water springs.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And from treasures and nice houses.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So it was; and We made the Descendants of Israel its inheritors.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So the Firaun’s people followed them at sunrise.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And when the two groups saw each other, those with Moosa said, “They have caught us.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Said Moosa, “Never! Indeed my Lord is with me, He will now show me the way.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So We sent the divine revelation to Moosa that, “Strike the sea with your staff”; thereupon the sea parted; so each part was like a huge mountain.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And We brought the others close to that place.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And We saved Moosa and all those with him.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Then drowned the others.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Indeed in this is surely a sign, and most of them were not Muslims.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And indeed your Lord – only He is the Almighty, the Most Merciful.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And recite to them the news of Ibrahim.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: When he said to his father and his people, “What do you worship?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: They said, “We worship idols, and we keep squatting in seclusion before them.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: He said, “Do they hear you when you call?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Or do they benefit you or harm you?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: They said, “In fact we found our forefathers doing likewise.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: He said, “Do you see these – (the idols) whom you worship?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “You and your forefathers preceding you.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “They are all my enemies, except the Lord Of The Creation.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “The One Who created me, so He will guide me.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And the One Who feeds me and gives me to drink.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And when I fall ill, so it is He Who heals me.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And He will give me death, then resurrect me.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And the One Who, upon Whom I pin my hopes, will forgive me my mistakes on the Day of Judgement.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “My Lord, bestow me the command and join me with those who deserve your proximity.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And give me proper fame among the succeeding generations.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And make me among the inheritors of the Gardens of serenity.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And forgive my father* – he is indeed astray.” (His paternal uncle)

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And do not disgrace me on the day when everyone will be raised.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “The day when neither wealth will benefit nor will sons.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Except he who presented himself before Allah, with a sound* heart.” (Intact or unblemished.)

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And Paradise will be brought close for the pious.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And hell will be revealed for the astray.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And it will be said to them, “Where are those whom you used to worship?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Instead of Allah? Will they help you or retaliate?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So they and all the astray were flung into hell.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And all the armies of Iblis. (Satan)

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And they will say, and they will be quarrelling in it:

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “By oath of Allah, we were indeed in open error.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “When we considered you equal to the Lord Of The Creation.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And none misled us but the guilty.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “So now we do not have any intercessors.” (The believers shall have intercessors, the disbelievers none).

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Nor a caring friend.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “So if only were we to go back, in order to become Muslims!”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Indeed in this is a sign; and most of them were not believers.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And indeed your Lord – only He is the Almighty, the Most Merciful.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: The people of Nooh denied the Noble Messengers.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: When their fellowman Nooh said to them, “Do you not fear?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “I am indeed a trustworthy Noble Messenger of Allah to you.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Therefore fear Allah, and obey me.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And I do not ask from you any fee for it; my reward is only upon the Lord Of The Creation.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Therefore fear Allah, and obey me.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: They said, “Shall we believe in you, whereas the abject people are with you?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: He said, “What do I know what their deeds are?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Indeed their account is only upon my Lord, if you perceive.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And I will not repel the Muslims.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “I am not but clearly a Herald of Warning.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: They said, “O Nooh, if you do not desist you will surely be stoned.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: He said, “My Lord, my people have denied me.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Therefore make a decisive judgement between me and them, and rescue me and the believers along with me.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So We saved him and those with him in a laden ship.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Then after it, We drowned the rest.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Indeed in this is a sign; and most of them were not believers.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And indeed your Lord, only He is the Almighty, the Most Merciful.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: (The tribe of) A’ad denied the Noble Messengers.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: When their fellowman Hud said to them, “Do you not fear?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “I am indeed a trustworthy Noble Messenger of Allah to you.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Therefore fear Allah and obey me.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And I do not ask from you any fee for it; my reward is only upon the Lord Of The Creation.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “What! You build a structure on every height, to laugh at the passers-by?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And prefer strong palaces, that perhaps you may live for ever?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And when you apprehend someone, you seize him mercilessly?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Therefore fear Allah, and obey me.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Fear Him Who has aided you with the things you know.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “He aided you with cattle and sons.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And with gardens and water-springs.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Indeed I fear upon you the punishment of a Great Day.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: They said, “It is the same for us, whether you advise us or not be of the preachers.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “This is nothing but the tradition of former people.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And we will not be punished.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: In response they denied him – We therefore destroyed them; indeed in this is a sign; and most of them were not believers.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And indeed your Lord – only He is the Almighty, the Most Merciful.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: The Thamud tribe denied the Noble Messengers.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: When their fellowman Saleh said to them, “Do you not fear?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “I am indeed a trustworthy Noble Messenger of Allah to you.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Therefore fear Allah and obey me.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And I do not ask from you any fee for it; my reward is only upon the Lord Of The Creation.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Will you be left peacefully in these favours over here?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “In gardens and water springs?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And fields and palm-trees, with delicate tendrils?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And you carve out dwellings in the mountains, with skill?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Therefore fear Allah and obey me.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And do not follow those who exceed the limits.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Those who spread turmoil in the earth, and do no reform.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: They said, “You are under a magic spell.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “You are just a human like us; therefore bring some sign if you are truthful.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: He said, “This is the she-camel – one day shall be her turn to drink, and on the other appointed day, shall be your turn.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And do not touch her with evil intentions for the punishment of the Great Day will seize you.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So they hamstrung her, and in the morning could only regret.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: The punishment therefore seized them; indeed in this is a sign; and most of them were not believers.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And indeed your Lord – only He is the Almighty, the Most Merciful.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: The people of Lut denied the Noble Messengers.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: When their fellowman Lut said to them, “Do you not fear?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “I am indeed a trustworthy Noble Messenger of Allah to you.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Therefore fear Allah and obey me.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And I do not ask from you any fee for it; my reward is only upon the Lord Of The Creation.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “What! Among all the creatures, you commit the immoral acts with men?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And leave the wives your Lord has created for you? In fact you are people who exceed the limits.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: They said, “O Lut, if you do not desist, you will be expelled.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: He said, “I am disgusted with your works.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “My Lord, rescue me and my family from their deeds.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: We therefore rescued him and his entire family.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Except one old woman, who stayed behind.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: We then destroyed the others.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And We showered a rain upon them; so what a wretched rain for those who were warned!

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Indeed in this is a sign; and most of them were not Muslims.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And indeed your Lord – only He is the Almighty, the Most Merciful.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: The People of the Woods denied the Noble Messengers.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: When Shuaib said to all of them, “Do you not fear?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “I am indeed a trustworthy Noble Messenger of Allah to you.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Therefore fear Allah and obey me.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And I do not ask from you any fee for it; my reward is only upon the Lord Of The Creation.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Measure in full, and do not be of those who reduce.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And weigh with a proper balance.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And do not give the people their goods diminished, and do not roam the earth causing turmoil.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And fear Him Who created you and the earlier creations.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: They said, “You are under a magic spell.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “You are just a human like us, and indeed we consider you a liar.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Therefore cause a part of the sky to fall upon us, if you are of the truthful.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: He said, “My Lord is Well Aware of what you do.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: In response they denied him – therefore the punishment of the day of the tent* seized them; that was indeed a punishment of a Great Day. (The clouds formed a tent and rained fire upon them).

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Indeed in this is a sign; and most of them were not Muslims.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And indeed your Lord – only He is the Almighty, the Most Merciful.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And indeed this Qur’an has been sent down by the Lord Of The Creation.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: The Trustworthy Spirit brought it down. (Angel Jibreel – peace be upon him.)

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Upon your heart, for you to convey warning.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: In plain Arabic language.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And indeed it is mentioned in the earlier Books.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And was this not a sign for them, that the scholars of the Descendants of Israel may recognise this Prophet?

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And had We sent it down upon a person other than an Arab,

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: In order that he read it to them, even then they would not have believed in it.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: This is how We have made (the habit of) denying embedded in the hearts of the guilty.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: They will not believe in it to the extent that they see the painful punishment.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So it will come upon them suddenly, whilst they will be unaware.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: They will therefore say, “Will we get some respite?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So do they wish to hasten Our punishment?

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Therefore observe, that if We give them some comforts for some years, –

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And then the promise that is given to them, does come upon them-

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So of what benefit will be the comforts that they were using?

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And never did We destroy a township which did not have Heralds of warning, –

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: To advise; and We never oppress.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And this Qur’an was not brought down by the devils.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: They are unworthy of it, nor can they do it.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Indeed they have been banished from the place of hearing.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Therefore do not worship another deity along with Allah, for you will be punished.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And O dear Prophet (Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), warn your closest relatives.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And spread your wing of mercy for the believers following you.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So if they do not obey you, then say, “Indeed I am unconcerned with what you do.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And rely upon (Allah) the Almighty, the Most Merciful.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Who watches you when you stand up.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And watches your movements among those who prostrate in prayer.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Indeed only He is the All Hearing, the All Knowing.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Shall I inform you upon whom do the devils descend?

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: They descend on every great accuser, extreme sinner. (The magicians)

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: The devils convey upon them what they heard, but most of them are liars.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And the astray follow the poets.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Did you not see that they keep wandering in every valley?

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And they speak what they do not do?

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Except those who believed and did good deeds, and profusely remembered Allah, and took revenge after they had been wronged*; and soon the unjust will come to know upon which side they will be overturned**. (* The Muslim poets who praise Allah and the Prophet. ** The disbelievers will be punished.)
